x.html:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' class='ggiraph-svg' role='graphics-document' id='svg_barplot' viewBox='0 0 648 360'>
 <defs id='svg_barplot_defs'>
  <clipPath id='svg_barplot_c1'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='648' height='360'/>
  </clipPath>
  <clipPath id='svg_barplot_c2'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='453.6' height='360'/>
  </clipPath>
 </defs>
 <g id='svg_barplot_rootg' class='ggiraph-svg-rootg'>
  <g clip-path='url(#svg_barplot_c1)'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='648' height='360' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='1' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-opacity='1' stroke-width='0.75' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-linecap='round' class='ggiraph-svg-bg'/>
  </g>
  <g clip-path='url(#svg_barplot_c2)'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='453.6' height='360' fill='#000000' fill-opacity='0' stroke='none'/>
   <text x='124.62' y='176.91' font-size='6.4pt' font-family='Helvetica'>Select 1 or more samples on the ordination plot above</text>
   <text x='128.91' y='189.21' font-size='6.4pt' font-family='Helvetica'>either by clicking or by using the lasso selection tool</text>
  </g>
 </g>
</svg>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
<svg xmlns='http://www.w3.org/2000/svg' xmlns:xlink='http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink' class='ggiraph-svg' role='graphics-document' id='svg_ord1' viewBox='0 0 504 324'>
 <defs id='svg_ord1_defs'>
  <clipPath id='svg_ord1_c1'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='504' height='324'/>
  </clipPath>
  <clipPath id='svg_ord1_c2'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='403.2' height='324'/>
  </clipPath>
 </defs>
 <g id='svg_ord1_rootg' class='ggiraph-svg-rootg'>
  <g clip-path='url(#svg_ord1_c1)'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='504' height='324' fill='#FFFFFF' fill-opacity='1' stroke='#FFFFFF' stroke-opacity='1' stroke-width='0.75' stroke-linejoin='round' stroke-linecap='round' class='ggiraph-svg-bg'/>
  </g>
  <g clip-path='url(#svg_ord1_c2)'>
   <rect x='0' y='0' width='403.2' height='324' fill='#000000' fill-opacity='0' stroke='none'/>
   <text x='134.07' y='152.77' font-size='6.4pt' font-family='Helvetica'>Click on the 'Edit Ordination' button.</text>
   <text x='201.6' y='165.06' font-size='6.4pt' font-family='Helvetica'></text>
   <text x='86.12' y='177.35' font-size='6.4pt' font-family='Helvetica'>(data provided to ord_explore does not contain an ordination)</text>
  </g>
 </g>
</svg>
